entities.name: marauder's map
entities.description: A magical map that shows the location of people in Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Harry explained to his friends how he and others entered the Room of Requirement.
Ron mentioned that they checked the Marauder's Map to see if Malfoy was in the Room of Requirement.
Malfoy entered the Room of Requirement, as mentioned by Ginny.
Ginny mentioned that Malfoy was clutching his Hand of Glory.
Malfoy must have been checking if the coast was clear to let the Death Eaters out, as mentioned by Ginny.
